message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's not something I can readily disclose details about without a non-disclosure agreement, but I can assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further. If not, I will be selling it to another buyer at a lower price. This is a limited time opportunity, so please respond as soon as possible.
